summary: Four rebellious teachers wreak havoc in their high-school to mess with the system.
cast: Patrick Bruel|Fabrice Luchini|Christophe Bourseiller|Laurent Gamelon|Etienne Draber|Martine Sarcey|Yolanda Jilot|Charlotte Julian|Guy Montagné|Isabelle Mergault|Chantal Neuwirth|Camille de Casabianca|Jean-René Gossart|Anne Fontaine|André Raffard|Malène Sveinbjornsson|Lionel Melet|Sheila O'Connor|Brigitte-Hélène Morel|Sylvie Senechal|Jacques Disses|Christine Melcer|David Pierre|Laurence Mercier|Benjamin Levy|Armelle Satty|Laetitia Carrie|Didier Pryzbylak|Patrick Schulmann
title: La revancha de los profes
